text: @IvankaTrump My mom has been stuck alone in her house since the end of February because your father told his cult members not to wear masks, and that COVID-19 isn't as bad as the flu - or a hoax. She didn't get Mother's Day, or my son's birthday with her family. Fuck you to hell, seriously.
